text: Thomas Pierce
Senior Front-End Developer
Building Performant, User-Focused Web Applications

I am a Senior Front-End Developer with extensive experience in Angular (AngularJS to Angular 19), React, and Vue.js. I am passionate about creating efficient, maintainable applications that provide exceptional user experiences.
My focus is on delivering performant and user-friendly applications. I have a broad understanding of front-end technologies and a strong commitment to building solutions that scale.
Summary of Skills

My core front-end skills include Angular, TypeScript, React, and Vue.js, along with state management libraries like NgRx, Redux, and Zustand. I am proficient in modern JavaScript (ES6+), CSS3, Sass/Less, Responsive Design, and Accessibility (WCAG).
I also have experience with back-end technologies such as Node.js, Next.js, API development (REST, GraphQL), database interaction (PostgreSQL, MongoDB), and cloud platforms (AWS).
I am dedicated to clean code principles (SOLID, DRY, YAGNI, KISS), web performance optimization, and utilizing tools like Git, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines to ensure efficient development workflows.
Brief Career Overview

As a front-end Architect with decades of experience, I've specialized in transforming legacy systems into modern, scalable solutions across healthcare, enterprise software, and cloud platforms. My career highlights include:

Led the complete modernization of Anju Software's eClinical Suite, reverse-engineering a mission-critical Java/JSP EDC system into a .NET/Angular platform while maintaining 100% functionality during transition, preserving $10M+ in annual support contracts.

Architected Citrix NFuse's web interface (Crossroads A-List Award winner) and rebuilt Citrix's global support portal, reducing support calls by 40% through innovative self-service tools and partner portal integration.
Spearheaded the AutoEncoder medical coding system's transformation into a standalone Angular/.NET API product, increasing user coding speed by 38% and creating new revenue streams.
Successfully delivered multiple enterprise-grade applications under tight deadlines, including:
AWS cloud migrations with serverless components
Clinical trial systems (EDC, CDM, eCRF) compliant with 21 CFR Part 11
Complex medical dictionary integrations (WHODrug/MedDRA)
Recognized for technical leadership in:
Legacy system modernization (Java-to-.NET, monolithic-to-microservices)
Cross-platform compatibility solutions (Windows/Java/UNIX via Citrix ICA protocol)
UI/UX standardization across product suites
My technical versatility spans Angular 2-19, React, .NET Core, and cloud architectures, complemented by proven abilities to:
Mentor teams through technology transitions
Communicate complex technical concepts to executives
Balance innovation with regulatory requirements
Rescue troubled projects through hands-on leadership
